title: banana_trees_rotational_harvest_management
summary: Banana trees producing fruit in rotation, enabling year-round harvest through continuous farm management.
description: This image documents banana trees at MaMeeFarm that produce fruit in a rotational cycle. The continuous availability of bananas throughout the year is the result of consistent farm management and planning, ensuring staggered growth and harvest rather than seasonal gaps.

external_reference.note: External reference is optional and non-binding. Primary verification relies on hash and OTS.
